title: JackalRelated's Authorpage
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar-bhl]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:cyberpunk theme-number=2]]

[[module CSS]]

#page-title {
   display: none;
}

:root {
   --hover-link-color: 26, 255, 0;
   --newpage-color: 65, 237, 62;
   --link-color: 65, 237, 62;
   --visited-link-color: var(--display-inter);
}

#main-content {
   background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
}

h2, h3 {
   font-family: 'Bedstead';
}

h2 {
   font-size: 1.6rem;
   text-align: center;
   color: rgb(var(--linkalt-hl));
   border-bottom: 0.2rem solid rgb(var(--linkalt-hl));
   margin-bottom: 0.3em;
}

h3 {
   color: rgb(var(--linkgr));
   margin-bottom: 0.01em;
}

.yui-navset .yui-content {
   color: rgb(var(--display-inter));
}

ul {
   margin-top: 0.1em;
   margin-bottom: 1.5em;
}

[[/module]]

------
[[=image main-alt.png]]
------

[[collapsible show="¬ª (SCP-4917) Don't do the dream crime" hide="¬´ If you can't do the dream time"]]
[[=image DREAMTIME.png]]
Made by CaimanChameleon. Absolutely awesome, and they even have an [*https://www.scp-wiki.net/caimanchameleon art page].
[[/collapsible]]
[[collapsible show="¬ª (SCP-5050) Endless Noise" hide="¬´ The voices reign through the clear static"]]
[[=image 5050-small.jpg]]
Made by Aethris. Stunningly beautiful - just seeing it instantly made my year. (See their [*https://www.scp-wiki.net/aethris-art art page] for more really great work!)
